snippet: The $85 billion in cuts, known as sequestration, have created strange bedfellows and new alliances among lobbyists who are seeking for their projects to be spared.
abstract: Federal spending cuts of $85 billion, known as sequestration, have created strange bedfellows and new alliances among lobbyists who are seeking for their projects to be spared.
lead_paragraph: The $85 billion in cuts, known as sequestration, have created strange bedfellows and new alliances among lobbyists who are seeking for their projects to be spared.

headline.seo: Lobbyists Work to Deter Sequestration Cuts
headline.main: Clamor to Be Spared the Pain as Budget Cuts Descend
headline.print_headline: Clamor to Be Spared the Pain as Budget Cuts Descend
